body.p:
Paducah Ky Jan 15th/61
Gov B Magoffin
Dr sir

Sometime since we wrote you and had the Commonwealths attorney to write you in the case of the Court vs ^John^ Doroux tried in the McCracken Equity & criminal court, at its last term, August) and received a respite for 12 months, the case is one that we can with confidence recommend to Executive Clemency We refer you to those letters for the facts of the case. & hope that you will think it right to send us a pardon releasing his fine

respect
A P Thompson
R S Ratcliffe

McCracken E & C Ct
$200. } Gaming
Jno Divoux
Remission Issd
Jany 30. 1861
